titleStmt.title: At the Generall Sessions of the Peace holden at [blank] in the [blank] yeere of the raigne of our Soueraigne Lord Iames by the grace of God king ... and of Scotland the [blank] and fortieth, there being present [blank] His Maiesties iustices of peace of the said [blank] in the same [blank] alehouse-keeper, is admitted and allowed ... to keepe a common alehouse

notesStmt.note: Blank form of license for alehouses, with 6 numbered articles to be observed.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
